definition: to avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing duties, questions, or issues
details:
verb
- to avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing duties, questions, or issues
= example: to avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing duties, questions, or issues
= synonyms: dodge
- escape, either physically or mentally
= example: escape, either physically or mentally
= synonyms: evade
- be incomprehensible to
= synonyms: escape
